overview: It’s a place like no other – a Caribbean island where the only people who exist are handsome, horny hunks who are hung like donkeys to a man! Sadly, your everyday high-street tour-operator won’t be able to get you there; but if the thought of a bevy of monster-hung dudes hanging out together gets your juices running then this glorious spunk-crazed escapade is definitely for you! Devon LeBron, Johny Cruz, Tim Law et al go au-natural in paradise – and believe us, there isn’t a mouth or butt that doesn’t get stretched to the max in the process!
title: Monster Cock Island
